Articles.Content:
The title says it all. Easy fix, but my God it's irritating lol 

Two nodes on the lander can are not centered. And while I'm here, why the odd lip around it? It's the only fairly decent lander can and it's got a lip that doesn't scale to any part I can think of, which also is a bit annoying personally.
I've been noticing a lot of parts were the edges of textures don't quite align correctly. Tail booms and nose cones to name two.
